summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 2, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms detailing inmate assignments, locations, and counts. The documents show Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to an attorney visit (ATTY) and list numerous other inmates in the facility.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative counts and assignment tracking of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 2, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein's assignment on this date was listed as 'ATTY' (attorney visit), indicating he had a scheduled legal meeting.
The documents show multiple inmates were on suicide watch orders, including inmates named Bang, Duncan, and Weber.
The records provide a detailed snapshot of the prison population, counts, and inmate movements on a specific day during Epstein's incarceration.
